item.title: Read parquet files from Azure Data Lake with Apache Spark
item.description: Azure Blob Storage - and especially the Datalake Gen 2 which is built on top and allows additional features like hierarchical namespace - is a great place to store data in all kinds of format: a data lake.

item.title: Backup Azure Storage Accounts
item.description: While regular backups of data came a bit out of fashion in the modern cloud world, there might be situations where you have to generate a copy of your data from a storage account.
